Recommendations: 1. It is recommended to utilize the result of the laboratory survey for the improvement of the delivery of instruction through laboratory works.
2. Availability of functional fire extinguisher in every laboratory room is recommended.
3. Laboratory stock rooms are recommended to house electronic components and equipment for safe keeping and thus laboratory rooms have more space to work on.
4. It is recommended that echo-seminar/ training be conducted to the faculty and staff in the use of high end laboratory equipment.
5. As based on the CMO, the College may purchase additional equipment required in the program for the effective and efficient delivery of knowledge to the students.
6. It is recommended that the Task force may substantiate each benchmark statement with relevant and updated documents.
